text: The Copa del Generalísimo 1959 Final was the 57th final of the King's Cup. The final was played at Santiago Bernabéu Stadium in Madrid, on 21 June 1959, being won by CF Barcelona, who beat Granada CF 4–1. ==Details== {| width="100%" |valign="top" width="50%"| {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" |colspan="4"|CF Barcelona: |- !width="25"| !!width="25"| |- |GK ||1 || Pedro Estrems |- |DF ||2|| Ferran Olivella |- |DF ||3|| Rodri |- |DF ||4|| Sígfrid Gràcia |- |MF ||5|| Enric Gensana |- |MF ||6|| Joan Segarra (c) |- |FW ||7|| Justo Tejada |- |FW ||8|| Sándor Kocsis |- |FW ||9|| Eulogio Martínez |- |FW ||10|| Luis Suárez |- |FW ||11|| Ramón Villaverde |- |colspan=4|Manager: |- |colspan="4"| Helenio Herrera |} |valign="top" width="50%"| {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" align=center |colspan="4"|Granada CF: |- !width="25"| !!width="25"| |- |GK ||1|| Rafael Piris |- |DF ||2|| José Becerril |- |DF ||3|| Vicente Díaz (c) |- |DF ||4|| Manuel Larrabeiti |- |MF ||5|| Ramoní |- |MF ||6|| José María Pellejero |- |FW ||7|| Juan Vázquez |- |FW ||8|| Ramón Carranza |- |FW ||9|| Loren |- |FW ||10|| Juan Armando Benavídez |- |FW ||11|| Arsenio Iglesias |- |colspan=4|Manager: |- |colspan="4"| Jenő Kalmár |- |} |} ==References== 1959 Copa Category:FC Barcelona matches
title: 1959 Copa del Generalísimo Final
